alert.note: Alert for Cimarron (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 2:01PM CDT until June 02 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cimarron County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Dallam County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northeastern Hartley County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 201 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dalhart, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Dalhart, Boise City, Keyes, Kenton, Wheeless, Ware, Black Mesa Park, Felt, Conlen, Griggs and Sturgis. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
